namespacedId.description: A unique identifier string, typically namespaced using a colon (e.g., 'core:player', 'mod_combat:action_attack'). Allows alphanumeric characters, underscore, hyphen, and colon.

nullableNamespacedId.description: A unique identifier string, typically namespaced (like namespacedId), or null.

entityReference.description: Specifies an entity. Can be a keyword ('actor', 'target'), a direct non-empty entity ID string, or an object containing the entity ID.

oneOf.description: Keyword ('actor', 'target') or direct entity ID string.
